mapper.select: SELECT A.ishop, A.NAME, A.location, A.information, ifnull(AVG(C.star),0) AS star,A.`x`, A.`y` FROM t_shop AS A JOIN t_shop_menu AS B ON A.ishop = B.ishop JOIN t_shop_review C ON C.ishop = A.ishop WHERE A.ishop = #{ishop}
SELECT a.ireview,c.nickname,a.star,a.review FROM t_shop_review a JOIN t_user c ON a.iuser = c.iuser WHERE a.ishop = #{ishop}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_shop_review SET ishop = #{ishop}, iuser = #{iuser}, star = #{star}, review = #{review}
